DocLocalization.Name: Objectif
DocLocalization.Documentation: Capture l'information quantitative associée à une contrainte de type objectif.

DocAttribute.Name: BenchmarkValues
LogicalAggregator
ObjectiveQualifier
DocAttribute.Documentation: Enumeration that qualifies the type of objective constraint.

DocAttribute.Name: UserDefinedQualifier
DocAttribute.Documentation: A user defined value that qualifies the type of objective constraint when ObjectiveQualifier attribute of type _IfcObjectiveEnum_ has value USERDEFINED.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR21
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute UserDefinedQualifier must be asserted when the value of the ObjectiveQualifier is set to USERDEFINED.
